function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective pandemic response policies","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, increased health risks for park visitors","Mitigation":"Implementing clear and effective pandemic response policies, enhancing sanitation and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Sanitation equipment, testing and tracing technology","People":"Park visitors, staff, local residents","Owner":"Park management, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate communication and coordination between park management and health authorities","Impact":"Delayed response to outbreaks, ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Establishing clear communication channels, regular coordination meetings, and joint action plans","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data sharing and analysis tools","People":"Park management, local health authorities, emergency responders","Owner":"Park management, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of adaptive governance features","Impact":"Inability to respond to evolving pandemic challenges, limited capacity to innovate and implement effective measures","Mitigation":"Implementing adaptive governance practices, promoting flexibility, learning, and innovation in park management","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, innovative management systems","People":"Park administrators, policy makers, community stakeholders","Owner":"Park management, local government"}]}
